thread.title: Shares in Al Noor spike on Mediclinc takeover - but NMC refuses to bow out of merger battle
thread.title_full: Shares in Al Noor spike on Mediclinc takeover - but NMC refuses to bow out of merger battle

author: Tara Cunningham
title: Shares in Al Noor spike on Mediclinc takeover - but NMC refuses to bow out of merger battle
text: FTSE 100 Shares in Al Noor spike on Mediclinc takeover - but NMC refuses to bow out of merger battle Mediclinc may have emerged as the victors in the takeover race for Al Noor, but NMC said this morning it would continue its pursuit Al Noor operates hospitals in the Middle East Photo: GETTY By Tara Cunningham , Business Reporter 12:23PM BST 14 Oct 2015
